ozpIwc.NamesApi Class

Extends ozpIwc.ApiBase
Defined in: app/js/services/api/system/systemApi.js:5
Module: bus.service.Type
Parent Module: metrics

The System Api. Provides reference data of registered applications, versions, and information about the current user through the IWC. Subclasses the ozpIwc.ApiBase.

Constructor

ozpIwc.NamesApi

()

Defined in app/js/services/api/system/systemApi.js:5

createDeathScream

() Object

Inherited from ozpIwc.ApiBase: app/js/services/api/apiBase.js:157

Create the data that needs to be handed off to the new leader.

Intended to be overridden by subclasses

Subsclasses can override this if they need to add additional handoff data. This MUST be a synchronous call that returns immediately.

Returns:

Object:

the data that will be passed to the new leader

() private

Inherited from ozpIwc.ApiBase: app/js/services/api/apiBase.js:750

Enables the API's request queue, all requests will be held until deliverRequestQueue or flushRequestQueue is called.

flushRequestQueue

() private

Inherited from ozpIwc.ApiBase: app/js/services/api/apiBase.js:771

Empties the queue of requests without processing and turns off queuing.

initializeData

(
  • deathScream
)
Promise

Inherited from ozpIwc.ApiBase: app/js/services/api/apiBase.js:194

Called when the API has become the leader, but before it starts serving data. Receives the deathScream of the previous leader if available, otherwise undefined.

Intended to be overridden by subclasses

Subsclasses can override this to load data from the server.

Parameters:

  • deathScream Object

Returns:

Promise:

a promise that resolves when all data is loaded.

)
Promise

Parameters:

  • headers Array

Returns:

Promise:

updateCollectionNode

(
  • cNode
)

Inherited from ozpIwc.ApiBase: app/js/services/api/apiBase.js:573

Removes the collector node resource from the collectors list if deleted. Removes references to nodes in the given collectors collection property if said referenced node is deleted. Adds newly created nodes to the collection property if said node's resource matches the collection nodes pattern property.

Parameters:

  • cNode Object

    the collector node to update
